body.name: Big Mo's Toys 24 Pack 8 Inch Glider Planes - Birthday Party Favor Plane, Great Prize, Handout Glider, Flying Models, Two Dozen

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Big Mo's Toys Store

features: SUPER VALUE/PARTY PACK-24 pieces; Great Party Favor, Good Behavior Rewards, Goodie Bag Toy, Birthday Giveaway, And Entertainment For An Entire Family!

GLIDER PLANE: At 8” Long, These Planes Soar Through The Air With Its Propellers Spinning At High Speed. With The Prop Whirring Faintly In The Background, These Planes Compare To The Real Thing And Will Have Children Enthralled.
ASSORTED STYLES: Each Pack Displays Assorted Plane Models And Styles. Including Historical And War Plane models.
INDIVIDUALLY PACKAGED: With Each Plane Set Being Packaged Individually, This Is The Ideal Toy For A Party Favor Or Goodie Bag Toy.
HIGH QUALITY: Made Of Sturdy Styrofoam, Ultimately Easier For Children To Assemble.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Party Pack Big Mo's Party Pack Glider Planes come in packs of 24, making it a favorite in Party Favors and Decorations! These planes are not limited to childs play, but are also fantastic for decorations. They are very easy to hang from the ceiling since they are so lightweight; and they don't need very strong tape, so the paint won't come off!! Additionally, these will bring back great memories for all the adults in the room!!

About The Brand Big Mo’s Toy’s: "Where Children Come First" Big Mo’s Toys is the leading brand, bringing you high quality games, toys, favors, novelties and more. Our products are child safe, tested, and non-toxic.

Product Qualities The prints on these planes were taken from the prints on actual fighter jets, making them great for boys in general! They are perfect though, for any boy who is obsessed with planes!! These cheap glider fighter jets, are great for flying indoor and out! No matter the weather, your child will be entertained!! These jets are great for kids of all ages!! Kids who can fly them, will have lots of fun playing catch, and kids who are too young, can play with them as toys!!! Whatever the age, they will not want to put those away!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for just about all ages!
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent little toy gliders for kids of all ages. From my two year old granddaughter to my 21 year old son to myself we have thoroughly enjoyed them and gotten literally hours of entertainment. Great value at about 3 for a dollar. They are what I expected and hoped which is simple, sturdy little gliders like those I played with as a kid. Would make excellent party favors. For young kids they are perfect for holding and running around making airplane noises. 2 year old just “helped” assemble it and then spent 2 hours waving it and running around everywhere. As expected It’s now bent battered and missing the tail fin but still being used with a giant grin and major airplane enthusiasm. For older kids and adults They actually fly consistently once you figure out they are designed for a hard fast upward (45 deg) throw and they will accelerate up then do a loop and gracefully glide 20 feet around to the ground. My grown sons and I spent at least an hour in the yard on Father’s Day throwing our planes. Trying different techniques and seeing how they respond, seeing if we could catch them after the loop, trying to hit each other or each other’s planes, etc etc. and that was with just the same first 3 planes we opened. So yeah an older kids or adult can expect to get plenty of use without damage as these are pretty sturdy. And I still have 20 in the bag waiting for my friends and their kids to come over and hangout sometime. The nose cone is absolutely needed for flight due to the weight it adds. The propeller changes the flight a little (slows it down) but can be flown with or without the prop. The nose come and prop have some very small parts so keep away from really young children. For toddlers and young kids you can also skip the small prop and nose cone parts and just let them play with the plane and run around rather than fly it (young kids won’t be able to throw these well enough for good flight anyway). Plus then those small parts are not a hazard. Best $8 I’ve spent in a looong time. Thanks amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and quality
reviews.reviewText: Used these for party favors and loved the individual packaging, clear instructions on wrapping, and quality. They fly great and have fun designs. They were a huge hit! Extremely satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids but do break easy
reviews.reviewText: Great product for birthday parties. The kids loved them but they do break easily since they are made of styrofoam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of planes for a low price
reviews.reviewText: Grandson enjoyed receiving so many planes. He's rough so they last about a couple of days (his flights hit walls, the cat and furniture). Good for relieving his boredom at time. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do you have a 4 year old?
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR - If you're looking for an RC plane, this isn't it. If you want something to have fun with that won't break the bank, these are a win.THESE. ARE. AMAZING. "Now hold on a second Jimmy. They're foam..." I'm gonna stop you right there and let you know that you're getting 24 of these magical flying doodads (that you must not let your 4 year old know that you have 24 of). See the trick is you spread this gimmick across multiple days every time one breaks. We've only replaced one so far.Let's set the stage: We had them out in the snow. Now, while they weren't the same after our 10 minute escapade, they still flew for another 2 days. That's not a typo. 2 days!!! They still work even though they've been wet, had tape on them to repair them (some did not survive the "repair"), and been thrown into everything - including their mother and the dogs. Now "still work" is relative here. Do they glide 8 miles? No. Do they go 5-10 feet? Sometimes. And that's when they're new. But when they don't, you laugh about it and throw it until it breaks or you "remember" you saw you had another and have them chill for a second.I hate disposable stuff, but we're all stuck doing nothing and this was a nice reprieve from the mundane. No one is gonna wax poetic about how beautiful these planes fly. But you'll get some belly laughs when one of them flies into a mixing bowl or gets into the bathroom right before a sibling does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Was good to distribute as a party favor - not the most sturdy or durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids and adults loved these!!
reviews.reviewText: We had these for our aviation themed wedding. The kids and adults loves these. You get plenty for your money. They are easy to put together and perfect size!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love them!!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 7 and 9 year old kiddos, since they love making paper airplanes but get frustrated if they don't look perfect. These are a huge hit! Both kiddos adore them; they look great, they are easy to assemble, they fly well, and my kiddos have enjoyed picking out multiple planes to fly outside and inside lol.

Yo lo compre porq me recordó a los aviones que vendían afuera de mi escuela cuando era pequeño. Son casi idénticos pero las hélices de plástico al frente son de pésima calidad y no ayudan al vuelo para nada. Pero el resto es casi idéntico 👍
No vuelan muy bien, hay otros del mismo precio y mejores
justo en la nostalgia, pero vienen muy frágiles, un niño de 5 años lo rompe al tratar de ensamblarlo.
